title: Step 59

challengeFiles.name: index
styles

tests.text: Your .cat-mouth-line-left selector should have a position property set to absolute.
Your .cat-mouth-line-left selector should have a top property set to 88px.
Your .cat-mouth-line-left selector should have a left property set to 74px.

description: Using a class selector, give your .cat-mouth-line-left element a position of absolute, a top of 88px and a left of 74px. This would move it into the right position.
